scenario_text.value: Phew... Why do I feel so tired?

Haha, it’s tough having to keep dealing with
this same scenario.

Well, next time they try and mess with me,
they’re not gettin’ off so easy.

You...you don’t mean you’re going to hurt
them, do you, Kaito?

I gotta say, Aoi, after all this, Kaito’s not
the only one who’s mad at them.
Let’s just hope we don’t run into them again.

I don’t know. I feel like now that you’ve
said that, we’re sure to run into them.

Yeah, only not like before someone dies. More
like before meeting someone.
So what happens if you’re in this shadow?

No, you don’t get it. It’s like if this were
a comic book, that’s what would happen next.

Er, I guess that’s not a very good
explanation.

Whatever! Let’s get back to looking for Miu.
We still haven’t found any clues yet!
